casebody.data:
State
v.
Simaron Demetrius Hill 165P16-1 Supreme Court of North Carolina. August 18, 2016 Simaron D. Hill, for Hill, Simaron Demetrius. Robert C. Montgomery, Special Deputy Attorney General, Howard S. Boney, Jr., District Attorney, for State of N.C.

The following order has been entered on the motion filed on the 18th of May 2016 by Defendant for Peremptory Setting:

"Motion Dismissed as moot by order of the Court in conference, this the 18th of August 2016."
